```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(parameters)
library(performance)
library(AICcmodavg)
library(sjPlot)
library(estimatr)
library(ggeffects)
library(report)
```

```{r}
data("penguins")
head(penguins)
```

```{r}
p <- penguins |>
  drop_na()
```

```{r}
ggplot(p, aes(body_mass_g, bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point()
```


### Contenido{.tabset .tabset-pills}

#### Modelo lineal general

$$
y_i = \beta_0 + \beta_1x_i +\epsilon_i
$$

```{r}
m1 <- lm(bill_length_mm ~ body_mass_g, data = p)
```

```{r}
summary(m1)
```

```{r}
parameters(m1)
```

```{r}
performance(m1)
```

#### Validacion del modelo (cumplimiento de supuestos)

El modelo lineal tiene dos supuestos que deben cumplirse, la normalidad de los residuales y la homogeneidad de la varianza de los residuales.

```{r}
plot(m1, which = c(1:6))
```

```{r}
check_model(m1)
```

```{r}
cn <- check_normality(m1)
cn
plot(cn)
```

```{r}
chc <- check_heteroscedasticity(m1)
chc
plot(chc)
```

```{r}
plot_model(m1, type = "pred", 
           show.data = T, 
           dot.size = 1,
           title = "Largo del pico en relación a la masa corporal de los pingüinos",
           axis.title = c("Masa corporal (g)", "Largo del pico (mm)"))
```

#### Selección del mejor modelo

```{r}
m2 <- lm(bill_length_mm ~ flipper_length_mm, data = p)
m3 <- lm(bill_length_mm ~ species, data = p)
m4 <- lm(bill_length_mm ~ island, data = p)
m5 <- lm(bill_length_mm ~ flipper_length_mm + species, data = p)
```

```{r}
modelos <- list(m1, m2, m3, m4, m5)
nombres <- c("m1", "m2", "m3", "m4", "m5")
```

```{r}
aictab(modelos, nombres, sort = T)
```

```{r}
cp <- compare_performance(m1, m2, m3, m4, m5, rank = T)
cp
```

```{r}
summary(m5)
```

```{r}
parameters(m5)
```

```{r}
plot_model(m5, type = "pred")
```

```{r}
check_normality(m5)
```

```{r}
check_heteroscedasticity(m5)
```

```{r}
performance(m5)
```

```{r}
m5r <- lm_robust(bill_length_mm ~ species, data = p)
summary(m5r)
```

```{r}
parameters(m5r)
```

```{r}
performance(m5r)
```

```{r}
plot_model(m5, type = "pred", vcov.args = "HC2",
           terms=c("flipper_length_mm","species"), colors = "Set1") + aes(linetype=group, color=group)
```

```{r}
g <- ggpredict(m5, terms = c("flipper_length_mm","species"))
ggplot(g, aes(x, predicted)) + 
    geom_line(aes(linetype=group, color=group)) +
    geom_ribbon(aes(ymin=conf.low, ymax=conf.high, fill=group), alpha=0.15) +
    scale_linetype_manual(values = c("solid", "dashed", "dotted")) +
  theme_bw() +
  ylab("Largo del pico (mm)") +
  xlab("Largo de la aleta (mm)")
```


```{r}
report(m5)
```
